summary: A nice player home located across the river from Riverwood, with a big armory.
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1 Changelog:


-----------------------------------------------------
Forget about Version 1.1 lmao, 1.2 shows how much I\'ve progressed with the CK since I first made this one.  Wait for V1.2 to be done, it\'ll be worth it.  I\'m almost done with it. Edited on 4/15/2012.
-----------------------------------------------------



It includes:

-Bedroom
-Armory (with over 30 mannequins and weapon racks)
-All Doomstones (in armory)
-All Shrines (main room)
-All crafting stations (Alchemy table, Enchanting table, Armor workbench, Grinding wheel, Forge, Tanning rack, Wood chopping block, Cooking pot, Smelter)
-TONS of storage all with their own unique names
-Fully navmeshed by hand


*Located across the river from Riverwood.  See map in screenshots for exact location.*


Installation:
Just place the MyPlace.esp into your Data folder and make sure it is checked in your Data Files list.


Notes:

-To get to the armory use the right teleport stone, the left one and the night mother coffin are purely cosmetic.

-Hope you like it and feel free to give suggestions/comments as I appreciate constructive criticism for future reference.  I do not plan on updating this, but will if persuaded to do so.  Enjoy.
********Due to interest in this house I will update it on request. :)***********

*The name of the house in the creation kit is MyPlace (not case sensitive if coc\'ing there) if you want to play around with it for personal use.*

Conflicts:
It will only conflict with any other house/mod that places something in the exterior cell where the Bethesda tutorial had you put an exterior entrance.  I placed it there because its a convenient location and I like the atmosphere around Riverwood.

Thanks to Eldiabs for his Modder\'s Resource Mod.  It made adding the mannequins MUCH easier.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11618
author: green120
